## Testing
- [ ] Not run
- [ ] Unit tests
- [ ] UI tests

## Accessibility Checklist
- [ ] New interactive elements have accessibility labels and hints
- [ ] Text uses `Font.cosmic*` (no fixed sizes)
- [ ] Touch targets are >= 44x44pt or use `.accessibleTouchTarget()`
- [ ] Tested with VoiceOver
- [ ] Tested with Dynamic Type (at least XL)
